title: A Winner's Fun Plans with Prize Money
summary: Bones won RuPaul's Drag Race UK and got £25,000. She is very happy and feels lucky. Bones and her friend Elle promised to go on a holiday together if one of them won. They might travel to Europe, the Caribbean, or on a cruise. Bones has been doing drag for seven years and lives in London. She will use the money to make her drag performances better because it costs a lot. Drag is an art where people dress up and perform. This show helps drag queens become famous. Bones says drag is more popular now, but queens have to work hard to succeed.

keywords.explanation: a fun performance art where people dress up in costumes and act
a reward for winning a competition
the person who comes first in a contest
acting or singing for an audience
creative activities like painting or dancing

questions.question: Who won RuPaul's Drag Race UK?
What will Bones do with some prize money?
How much money did Bones win?
What did Bones and Elle promise each other?

background_read: RuPaul's Drag Race is a TV show where drag queens compete in challenges. Drag is a type of performance where people dress up in fancy clothes and makeup, often to entertain others. The winner gets a prize and becomes more famous. This article talks about the UK version of the show and how the winner plans to use her prize money for fun and to improve her art.
Article_Structure: WHO: Bones, the winner of RuPaul's Drag Race UK
WHAT: She won £25,000 and plans to go on holiday with a friend and improve her drag performances
WHERE: The competition took place in the UK, and Bones is from Stalybridge and lives in London
WHY: To share how the winner is celebrating and using the prize money to support her drag career

perspectives.description: Bones feels happy and lucky to win, showing the positive side of competition
Bones and Elle's promise highlights how friends support each other even in contests
